NATIONAL TRADE CERTIFICATE

After completion of the prescribe period of training the final All lndia Trade Test for Craftsman will be conducted by N.C.V.T. and the successful passed out trainees will be awarded the R.N.T.C. by State Council ofTechnical Education & Vocation Training. Orissa, Bhubaneswar & N.T.C. from New Delhi will be awarded after words.

APPRENTICESHIP TRAINING

The institute does not deal with the apprenticeship training of the passed out trainees directly & shall be dealt by the Zonal Deputy Apprenticeship Advisor, Govt. lT l., Rkl b as per Govt. rules on purely merit basis. The Institute will not take any responsibility for apprenticeship training.

PLACEMENT ASSISTANCE

The institute provides placement assistance to its trainees on merit basis in different industrial sector. The placement cell ofthis institution inviting different organisation conducting. Campus interview time to time for better employment. From the tracer study it is anticipated that trainees of this institute employed in various industries within the country & abroad establishing name &fame.

CONCESSION & OTHER MISC FEES

(l) The trainees can’t be allowed any type of concession during theirtraining period.

(ii) FirstAid will be given by the institute.

(iii)Recreation Facilities may be considered. Other charges like AITT Form Fill-up Fee, Industrial Study Tours, Cert verification, Council Registration,

(iv)Examination, Development, Function & Seminar, Games & Sports, Computer, Damage & Breaking etc. will be charged extra bythe students.

(v) The SC/STtrainees will get Post l\/latric scholarship bythe Govt.

VISIT TO WORKS

lndustrial tour shall be arranged by the institute during the training period including attending practical classes on sophisticated machineries etc. at different works. Tour cost must be bear by the trainees.

HOSTEL FACILITIES

For outstation candidates accommodation shall be provided in the hostel, if desires.
